class_notes:
We will make special accommodations for online instruction for this course. Your instructor will communicate the mode of instruction before the start of classes.
Class will be held in BMI classroom, 4th floor Woodruff Memorial Research Building (Room 4004)
course_description: This course covers fundamental machine learning theory and techniques. The topics include basic theory, classification methods, model generalization, clustering, and dimension reduction. The material will be conveyed by a series of lectures, homeworks, and projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 5570, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Mahmoudi, Status: Open
